21-0_training_400_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM sampled_company_name_1 AS cn,
   sampled_company_type_1 AS ct,
   sampled_keyword_1 AS k,
   sampled_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
   sampled_movie_info_1 AS mi,
   sampled_movie_keyword_1 AS mk,
   sampled_title_1 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[pt]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%µ%' OR cn.name LIKE '%e%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'secret-agent'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Thriller', '83,102 (Sweden)', 'UK:1 March 1984', 'Prilep, Macedonia', 'USA:2 February 1973')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1963 AND 1983;

   sampled_company_type_1 AS ct,
   sampled_keyword_1 AS k,
   sampled_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
   sampled_movie_info_1 AS mi,
   sampled_movie_keyword_1 AS mk,
   sampled_title_1 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[fr]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%n%' OR cn.name LIKE '%a%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'wine'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('War', 'PLFMB 30811', 'Mexico:154', '4099', 'Franz-Xaver Kroetz')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1984 AND 1993;
